column4: wtf I Just installed ubuntu 7.10 and when ever i move the mouse the computer shutsdown? any1 know 2 fix this?
wtf I Just installed ubuntu 7.10 and when ever i move the mouse the computer shutsdown? any1 know 2 fix this?

I don't know what to tell you abotu your mouse this is the first time I have ever heard of such a thing , are you using  hibernate /suspend or some strange settings on  shutdown keyboard buttons and such, might be something crossed
